sentences.en: At the end of every day, jot down a brief note on how peppy or tired you felt.
sentences.cn: 每天结束时，随便写上一小段，记下你感到多么有活力或多么疲劳。

sentences.en: Carry a notepad and pen or pencil with you to jot down ideas.
sentences.cn: 随身带有记事本和钢笔或铅笔以记下你的主意.

sentences.en: Could you just jot his name on there?
sentences.cn: 你能把他的名字先记在那上面吗？

sentences.en: Have a pad and pencil ready and jot down some of your thoughts.
sentences.cn: 准备好铅笔和便笺簿，把你的一些想法记下来。

sentences.en: I don't care a jot for their feelings.
sentences.cn: 我一点都不理会他们的感受.

sentences.en: I don't care one jot or one tittle of what he says.
sentences.cn: 他所说的我一点也不在乎.

sentences.en: I'll jot down their address before I forget it.
sentences.cn: 我得赶快把他们的地址写下来,免得忘了.

sentences.en: It doesn't affect my judgement one jot.
sentences.cn: 这丝毫不会影响我的判断。

sentences.en: Just jot down the main ideas [ points ] of what he says.
sentences.cn: 把他讲话的大意记下来就行了.

sentences.en: Keep a pad handy to jot down queries as they occur.
sentences.cn: 手边放一本便笺簿，以便有问题时随时记下。

sentences.en: Let me jot down your telephone number so that I can call you later.
sentences.cn: 让我记下你的号码,以后好打电话给你.

sentences.en: Listen carefully to the instructions and jot them down.
sentences.cn: 仔细听指示，并记录下来。

sentences.en: We abate nothing of our just demands: not one jot or tittle do we recede.
sentences.cn: 我们的正当要求绝不打任何折扣: 我们一丝一毫也不退让.

words.tran_cn: 简短的笔记；匆匆记下的东西；略记

trans.tran_cn: 一点，少量，稍许，（字母的）一点，一划

trans.tran_en: If you jot something short such as an address somewhere, you write it down so that you will remember it

trans.tran_cn: 草草记下， 匆匆记下
trans.tran_en: If you jot something short such as an address somewhere, you write it down so that you will remember it
